title: altair-devnet-1+2 recap

labels.name: meta-stale
labels.description: Label for stale issues applied by the stale bot.

body:
This issue is just to persist relevant metrics for a node of us that ran the altair-devnet-1 multiclient testnet, charts below are for the 22 July 2021 to 29 July 2021 period.

Overall it went well, no major issues on our side. We improved our selection of attestations to include only those that are useful for the network

![Screenshot from 2021-07-29 12-01-46](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/127473882-ec2b5e76-e42c-4aae-abce-b3f9fe327a85.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-07-29 12-02-10](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/127473896-2c8223c4-1739-4d94-bc33-c777ceaeec40.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-07-29 12-03-38](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/127473908-cb92953a-deb6-4f8e-aeed-bd5cfc37c786.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-07-29 12-06-57](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/127473925-4007cd24-4779-4620-9762-cdd47196712e.png)

This issue is just to persist relevant metrics for a node of us that ran the altair-devnet-2 multiclient testnet, charts below are for the July 29 2021 to August 11 2021 period.

### General metrics

Very stable memory and CPU usage through the two weeks. Validator performance is good but it could be a bit better, still 3% of attestations missed

![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 08-47-34](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128983007-00387018-2fc4-4339-8580-854f11e67818.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 08-47-50](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128983009-ea82b010-4e67-4429-82e4-d43c5e71d6d7.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 08-48-07](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128983012-356aaae5-1007-4421-a7fa-48dc006cfa7e.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 08-49-00](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128983021-901274ca-da32-464f-b07e-92ab54d5bd15.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 08-49-25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128983029-06ffdec1-7aad-47a5-88ee-ec389208c62a.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 08-49-49](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128983030-cbbd6303-38b7-4178-9a5d-cbeb44391b5b.png)

### Validator performance

**1**
![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 08-52-37](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128983039-e23fcc90-3aa4-403b-8da7-17e1728b7528.png)

**3** (expect first 12 hours)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 09-45-22](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128990158-89a623a0-e422-4985-b697-914fba565fa0.png)

**4** (expect first 12 hours)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-11 09-45-32](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128990189-67d29b1b-f08d-4bb2-b4fb-78e6a184db7b.png)


### REST API metrics

This beacon node was serving 1000 validators, so that high number may distort the metrics. However some response times are consistently higher than others. Investigate why

![Screenshot from 2021-08-10 17-34-00](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128982063-94248eb5-7c14-4af4-b820-706b382dd8b2.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-10 17-35-43](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128982059-7bb56ab8-f811-4ab3-bad6-a7f059628cea.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-10 17-35-24](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128982060-ded9ab69-57f5-4305-97a6-83acdf5b346a.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-10 17-37-09](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128982057-5a7e839d-c7da-47ad-8f84-65ab2f2a828c.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-10 17-37-48](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128982047-866853fd-4466-4a02-b00a-bd41c3a3d459.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-10 17-37-21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128982053-1a8e61c1-d2e4-4e3d-a97d-0f120d5dcf93.png)

![Screenshot from 2021-08-10 17-37-37](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128982049-3aa555ad-c5b1-408e-998a-535f52c2017d.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-08-10 17-37-59](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35266934/128982043-d6ac2963-7543-48e9-aabe-49b12d779326.png)
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed in 15 days if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
This issue or pull request has been automatically been closed due to inactivity.
